subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: A fullback known as Big Mo, he starred with his brother Dick, the defensive tackle called Little Mo, on an undefeated University of Maryland team, then collided with him in the N.F.L. in the 1950s.
snippet: A fullback known as Big Mo, he starred with his brother Dick, the defensive tackle called Little Mo, on an undefeated University of Maryland team, then collided with him in the N.F.L. in the 1950s.
